remarks: Properties of a pair in an extended binary relation.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 30-Oct-2017.)
statement:
isprmpt2.1 $e |- ( ph -> M = { <. f , p >. | ( f W p /\ ps ) } ) $.
isprmpt2.2 $e |- ( ( f = F /\ p = P ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
isprmpt2 $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F e. X /\ P e. Y ) -> ( F M P <-> ( F W P /\ ch ) ) ) ) $.
$d F f p $.
$d P f p $.
$d W f p $.
$d ch f p $.
